statements: SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data;
SELECT location, temperature FROM historical_weather_data;
SELECT date, precipitation FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND precipitation < 10;
SELECT id, temperature, precipitation FROM historical_weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM historical_weather_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20
SELECT id, location, date, temperature FROM historical_weather_data WHERE precipitation > 5 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM historical_weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM historical_weather_data
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data ORDER BY precipitation DESC;
SELECT proposal_id, researcher_name, proposal_title FROM research_proposal WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT proposal_id, proposal_title FROM research_proposal WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM weather_data;
SELECT researcher_name, submission_date FROM research_proposal WHERE proposal_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT proposal_title, proposal_description FROM research_proposal WHERE proposal_title ILIKE '%data%' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude < 40
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25.0 AND humidity < 70.0;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude, project_name FROM Locations INNER JOIN ResearchProjects ON Locations.location_id = ResearchProjects.location_id;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM research_stations ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM research_stations WHERE location LIKE '%e%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT station_name, location FROM research_stations WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT region_name, description FROM climate_regions WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM weather_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_stations WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT data_id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT location, temperature_change FROM climate_analysis ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM weather_stations WHERE elevation > 500;
SELECT station_name, location, elevation FROM weather_stations ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 0.5;
SELECT analysis_id, date, location, temperature_change FROM climate_analysis WHERE temperature_change BETWEEN -2.0 AND 2.0;
SELECT researchers.first_name, researchers.last_name, research_proposals.title FROM researchers JOIN research_proposals ON researchers.researcher_id = research_proposals.researcher_id
